name: CLKComplicationTemplateCircularSmallRingText
desc: A template for displaying a short text string encircled by a configurable progress ring.

items.name: init(textProvider: CLKTextProvider, fillFraction: Float, ringStyle: CLKComplicationRingStyle)
items.desc: Creates a new template from the provided text, fill fraction, and ring style.

items.name: var textProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the complication.

items.name: var ringStyle: CLKComplicationRingStyle
items.desc: The style of the progress ring.

items.name: var fillFraction: Float
items.desc: The fraction of the ring to fill.
